newsitem.title: USA: CD Radio stock halted pending auction - CEO.
newsitem.headline: CD Radio stock halted pending auction - CEO.

text.p: Trading in the stock of CD Radio Inc. will be halted pending the outcome of a federal auction for licenses to offer a new nationwide radio service, the chairman of the company said Tuesday.
CD Radio is one of four companies participating in a Federal Communications Commission auction of licenses to offer the service, which will be beamed nationwide via satellite.
CD Radio chairman David Margolese told Reuters that the company ordered the halt in the trading of its stock on the Nasdaq market until news of the auction outcome is disseminated.
Bidding at the FCC auction began Tuesday morning.
